post.body: hi. @mattquinlan said you might know how to do tethering of an iPhone 3g?
I keep my Nokia 65i around just to do tethering. I'll check with @amdev. Thanks!
Getting my emails or phone call from yesterday?
Hi Matt: Using an iPhone for teathering by any chance? I'm looking for a tutorial on how to do so.
I've been wondering how/why the eticate stays so formal on Twitter.
Sales guys who want to celebrate success at a new customer site talk a lot! :)
I thankfully say the same thing about my wife! My kids have beautiful skin and great freckles!
It might be Selenium using HTA, we're investigating using the Add-ons API instead. Will contribute what we find.
We've also seen terrible slowness running Selenese test on RC with IE7.
I'm back at the PushToTest World Headquarters :-) Not much of a soft re-entry. Lots of customer activity and a whole new plan for 2009!
Not many tweets from me this week. I'm in Vieques, Puerto Rico on holiday with the family.
Meeting my family and going on the big XMas vacation tomorrow!
I'm using Titanium's example app Tweetanium everyday now. Amazing work Marshall!
Had drinks with @marshall_law to learn more about Appcelerator Titanium.
Just started a new era of Testing at Tribal DDB. They have a PushToTest solution that lets them run more powerful tests at a lower price.
Just learned that I'm a speaker at STAREast on test RIA/Ajax apps.
A lot of people are already on XMas vacation. I can tell because my email is at manageable levels!
